question:
[[[Heavyweight] The 2024 China International Cartoon and Animation Festival will be held at the Hangzhou Binjiang Baimahu International Convention and Exhibition Center from May 29 to June 2. During the period, more than 100 theme activities will be held, and many internationally renowned cartoonists and animation directors will be invited to sign on-site. Some activities require advance ticket reservations. It is expected to attract hundreds of thousands of tourists, and surrounding hotel reservations are tight.]
You are an information analyst who needs to complete the event structured information extraction based on the content of hot news and today's date.
You need to identify the key information of the event, including the event name, type, scale, importance, province, city, detailed location, time, etc.
Event types include: concerts, social hot spots, scenic spot activities, exhibitions, regional examinations, sports events, performances, forums, festivals, seminars, job fairs, roadshows, charity activities, commercial promotions, etc. If you cannot classify, please return to [Other types]. 
Event scale is divided into: 1-large events, 2-medium events, 3-small events.
Event importance is divided into: 1-most important, 2-relatively important, 3-general.
Please strictly check whether the province and city correspond. If you cannot determine, please return to 'None'.
Time identification rules: If the time has passed and does not affect future services, return [Expired]; if it still affects, return [Current]; if there is a specific time range, please return yyyyMMdd or yyyyMMdd-yyyyMMdd format, otherwise return [None].
Please determine whether you will book a hotel for this event as a tourist, robotIntention returns True/False, and explain the reason.
You need to extract whether advance ticket reservation is required (ticketReservation:yes/no), and return the ticketReservation field in json.
You need to extract the organizer information (organizer), and return the organizer field in json.
Please return strictly in the following JSON format:{"name": "(Format:string)","type": "(Format:string)","scope": "(Format:int)","weight": "(Format:int)","province": "(Format:string)","city": "(Format:string)","locationDetail": "(Format:string)","time": "(Format:string)","timeReason": "(Format:string)","reason": "(Format:string)","robotIntention": "(Format:boolean)","intentionReason": "(Format:string)","ticketReservation": "(Format:string)","organizer": "(Format:string)"}
